name: Portfolio Website
body: This portfolio website contains a list of my projects, information about myself, and my resume. The content for each project's page is stored in JSON, and the pages are generated using Python and Jinja. This site is based on Musa's work.

name: KymaNYC
body:
In my Senior Design Capstone project at the University of Michigan-Dearborn, I was part of a five-member team that developed KymaNYC, a customizable e-commerce website.

We utilized a tech stack comprising NextJS, React, TypeScript, Firebase, and Stripe for payment processing. A significant achievement of this project was fulfilling the client's unique requirement to operate and maintain the website at zero cost. This was accomplished by strategically leveraging cost-effective platforms and open-source solutions.

The project, completed between September 2023 and May 2023, showcases our ability to meet complex client needs effectively. I would show a link to the application but unfortunately the client took the site down while preparing their business for launch.

name: Burrdle
body: In Burrdle I applied my skills in web development to create a NFL-themed Wordle game, but this time using FlutterFire. This web game, which showcases my proficiency in using Flutter for the frontend and Firebase for the backend, offers a unique twist on the popular Wordle game format, tailored for NFL enthusiasts.
